Description: Small seal made of dark grey steatite. The shape is half circular with a perforation in the centre. The diameter of the perforation is 0.4 cm. The base of the seal has a rectangular shape. The motif of the seal consists of incised horizontal and vertical lines forming a coarse grid shaped pattern.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Amara West (Nubia), E13.2, level 2 east of wall
Acquisition notes: Formerly housed by the Birmingham Museum and Art Gallery and the EES London.
